LanguageData.MustPlaceInsideShipFramework: Must place in a room bordered only by ship parts.
LanguageData.MustPlaceInsideShip: Must place inside a fully enclosed ship hull.
LanguageData.MustPlaceSolarShipWithFreeSpaces: Must place extendable solar panel with free space.
LanguageData.ShipInsideOrbitDesc: Launch the ship to orbit. Doesn't require cryptocaskets, but the doors should probably be closed and locked.
LanguageData.ShipInsideLandDesc: Land on the planet surface. Make sure you don't forget anyone!
LanguageData.ShipInsideRenameDesc: Rename the ship. I hear that's good luck.
LanguageData.ShipInsideShortJumpDesc: Jump to a new orbit location. Make sure everyone is inside!
